match.note1: port can be COM name or tty path. e.g. COM4 or /dev/ttyACM0
match.note2: baudrate is optional for Virtual COM Port. Default is 115200
match.note3: data-bits can be set to 5/6/7/8. Default is 8
match.note4: stop-bits can be set to 1/1.5/2. Default is 1
match.note5: parity can be none/odd/even/mark/space. Default is none
match.note6: flow-control can be none or dtr/dsr or rts/cts. Default is none

config.note6: timeout-ms default is 5000ms. Can be set to 0 to wait forever
